sentences.en: A defining aspect of my photography is that I often work with portraiture.
sentences.cn: 对于我的摄影起决定性作用的是我常常自拍.

sentences.en: All of his numbered works are portraiture of his inner feelings in the turbulent era.
sentences.cn: 其传世作品不多,但篇篇俱是风云激荡时代作者心态的真实记录.

sentences.en: And beware how in making the portraiture , thou breakest the pattern.
sentences.cn: 另外要小心, 我们在做好事时,不要先毁了自己.

sentences.en: He said these included the inclusion of a small, fleshy bulge at the upper corner of Shakespeare’s left eye, a detail typical of the minor adjustments made in original portraiture.
sentences.cn: 他说，这些改变如莎士比亚的左眼上角微小凸起的肌肉，这是画家对原来肖像画所做细小调整的典型细节。

sentences.en: I am going to have my portraiture taken.
sentences.cn: 我请人给自己画张肖像.

sentences.en: It must be a portraiture of couples that makes people an enjoyment of life.
sentences.cn: 这一定是世间无数对夫妻的生活写照,这种生活模式给人一种天伦之美.

sentences.en: Major in natural, personality, portraiture, out door pre - wedding and event photography.
sentences.cn: 主修于自然界拍摄, 个性摄影, 个人写真,户外婚纱, 嘉礼摄影.

sentences.en: Portraiture merges here with voyeurism and surveillance.
sentences.cn: 肖像拍摄中夹杂着偷窥和监视.

sentences.en: Suited to such uses as fashion, portraiture, interior, and product photography.
sentences.cn: 适于拍摄例如流行时尚 、 肖像 、 室内和产品摄影.

sentences.en: The dispute illuminates the primitive nature of our attitude to portraiture.
sentences.cn: 这一争论阐释了我们对肖像画的态度的本性。

sentences.en: Their works symbolized a change in portraiture and were of special importance in Chinese painting history.
sentences.cn: 他们的作品标志着人物画的转变,因而在绘画史上占有特殊地位.

sentences.en: What style of portraiture emerges in the era of data - banks and affect sensors?
sentences.cn: 在数据库和传感器的年代中诞生了什么样的形象?

sentences.en: Whatever our instincts to see a portrait as a tribute to a great person, the reality is that portraiture is a window on the past, warts and all.
sentences.cn: 无论我们将肖像视为向伟大人物致敬的本能是什么，现实是肖像画是一扇毫不掩饰的面对过往的窗户。

words.tran_cn: 记述者；描画者；肖像画家

trans.tran_cn: 肖像画法，描绘，描写，传真
trans.tran_en: the art of painting or drawing pictures of people
